column4: Just installed Dapper on my shiny new Ferrari 4002 Acer laptop (Wide screen ATI x700, 64bit AMD) but the screen goes black when it tried to launch into the window manager... i've read somewhere that i need to change the primary display back to the LCD, but dont know how to do this.. anyone help?
if you find out how to define which is the primary display, please speak up
well, not really. I'm setting up dualview, but my tv keeps on being the primary display no matter what dvi port i put it in.
